name: Eyes Of Fear Beta
description:
"Eyes of Fear" is a survival horror game set in a hospital located far from any city. The hospital was the site of a horrific massacre where around 80 staff members disappeared without a trace. The player assumes the role of a morgue worker who barricaded himself in the morgue and stayed there for about a month. All he could hear during this time were the screams of the missing staff members.

After some time, the player decides to leave the morgue and investigate what happened in the hospital. The game takes place in the year 2002, and the player must navigate through the hospital's dark and eerie corridors, avoiding traps, solving puzzles, and fighting off supernatural enemies.

As the player progresses through the game, they uncover the truth about the massacre and the hospital's dark past. They must use all their wits and resources to survive and escape the hospital before they become the next victim. With immersive gameplay, a gripping storyline, and terrifying environments, "Eyes of Fear" is a game that will keep players on the edge of their seats."

Remember! This is just a beta test, so during further updates the story will expand and the gameplay will be more interesting!
